thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Disappointing
thread.title_full: Very Disappointing - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: doublfault
title: Very Disappointing
text:
The Hyatt brand has long been one of our favorites but the Hyatt Regency at San Francisco Airport was substantially below the standards we had come to expect from visiting Hyatt international facilities. Our room was without any of the nice amenities customarily available in first class hotels such as bathrobes and a stocked mini-bar (ours was empty) to cite a few. The shuttle from the airport to the hotel was a long time in coming as the Hilton and Marriott shuttles passed by twice as we waited in the cold. We were told (by an airport wheelchair person) that the Hyatt shuttle usually passed by every 10 minutes. We waited more than 20 minutes.
Breakfast service in their dining area was, with the exception of the bus-boy who brought coffee, slow in coming to take our order and was anything but first class. I ordered a bagel which came without any jam or butter. Only cream cheese was included.
Based on the room price of $325 we should have chosen another facility like Embassy Suites where breakfast is included.
